SEARCH
Package bl

Class AccountService

java.lang.Object
bl.AccountService
public class AccountService extends Object
Provides services for managing user accounts. This class handles operations such as account creation, deletion, authentication, and persisting account data in a JSON file.

    • isUsernameExistInDb

      public boolean isUsernameExistInDb(String username)
      Checks if a username exists in the database (in-memory list).
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check.
      Returns:
      true if the username exists, false otherwise.

    • isPassCorrectForCurrentUser

      public boolean isPassCorrectForCurrentUser(String username, String password)
      Checks if the password is correct for the current user.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the account.
      password - The password to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the password is correct for the given username, false otherwise.

    • getAccountByUserName

      public Account getAccountByUserName(String username)
      Retrieves an account by its username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the account to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Account object if found.
      Throws:
      AccountIsNotFoundedException - If the account is not found.
